price: Ntwaremu bi bɛtware wͻn mmienu no (aheman mu foͻ no ne Ogya no mu foͻ) no ntam. Mmarima bi wͻ fasuo no sorosoro a wᴐde (abᴐnefoᴐ no mu) biara nsohyε deε na ɛbɛhu wͻn; na wͻbεfrε Aheman no mufoͻ no sε: “Asomdwoeε nka mo.” Wͻnnya nwuraa (Aheman no) mu deε, nanso wͻwͻ ho anidaasoͻ.
arabic: وَبَيۡنَهُمَا حِجَابٞۚ وَعَلَى ٱلۡأَعۡرَافِ رِجَالٞ يَعۡرِفُونَ كُلَّۢا بِسِيمَىٰهُمۡۚ وَنَادَوۡاْ أَصۡحَٰبَ ٱلۡجَنَّةِ أَن سَلَٰمٌ عَلَيۡكُمۡۚ لَمۡ يَدۡخُلُوهَا وَهُمۡ يَطۡمَعُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wabaynahumā ḥijābun waʿalā al-aʿrāfi rijālun yaʿrifūna kullan bisīmāhum wanādaw aṣḥāba al-janati an salāmun ʿalaykum lam yadkhulūhā wahum yaṭmaʿūna
